name: ARError.Code
desc: Codes that identify errors in ARKit.

items.name: case requestFailed
items.desc: An error the framework produces when a request fails.

items.name: case cameraUnauthorized
items.desc: An error that indicates the app lacks user permission for the camera.

items.name: case fileIOFailed
items.desc: An error the framework produces when file access fails to read or write.

items.name: case insufficientFeatures
items.desc: An error that indicates the framework requires more features to complete a task.

items.name: case invalidCollaborationData
items.desc: An error that results when the framework fails to parse collaboration data the app receives over the network.

items.name: case invalidConfiguration
items.desc: An error that indicates the configuration contains ambiguous or erroneous data.

items.name: case invalidReferenceImage
items.desc: An error that indicates the framework failed to process a reference image.

items.name: case invalidReferenceObject
items.desc: An error that indicates the framework failed to process a reference object.

items.name: case invalidWorldMap
items.desc: An error that indicates the framework failed to process a world map.

items.name: case microphoneUnauthorized
items.desc: An error that indicates the app lacks user permission for the microphone.

items.name: case objectMergeFailed
items.desc: An error that indicates the framework failed to merge a detected object.

items.name: case sensorFailed
items.desc: An error that indicates a sensor failed to provide required input.

items.name: case sensorUnavailable
items.desc: An error that indicates the framework failed to access a required sensor.

items.name: case unsupportedConfiguration
items.desc: An error that indicates the device doesn’t support the session’s configuration.

items.name: case worldTrackingFailed
items.desc: An error the framework produces when world tracking experiences an unrecoverable problem.

items.name: case geoTrackingFailed
items.desc: An error that indicates the framework failed to match localization imagery with the device’s camera captures.

items.name: case geoTrackingNotAvailableAtLocation
items.desc: An error the framework produces when a location lacks geotracking support.

items.name: case locationUnauthorized
items.desc: An error that indicates the app lacks user permission for the device’s current location.
